Description:
Required skills to be successfulSuperior awareness and understanding of relevant trends, technology and issues around consumer loyalty, ecosystem plays and business practices
Understanding of partnership constructs and varied approaches based on types of organizations
Proficient understanding of financial concepts and practices as they relate to commercial constructs and contract management.
Strong team player with ability to work with diverse set of stakeholders
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications.What equips you for the roleBachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
7-10 years of relevant partnership experience gained through a combination of working with medium to large organizations as well as technology driven start-ups
Experience of working in different geographies / multi-cultural experience is a plus
Experience of taking a strategic view towards partnerships as well as enabling execution of plans
Demonstrable ability to work under pressure and determine priorities to meet deadlines
Proven partnership relationship management skills and experienceJob Details
